ca.dracode.ais.indexclient

Interface IndexListener


  • public interface IndexListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectedToService()
      Called when the IndexClient has connected to the ClientService; Files can now be loaded and searches can now be made
      void disconnectedFromService()
      Called when the IndexClient has disconnected from the ClientService, the ClientService should now be disposed of
      void errorWhileSearching(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String index)
      Called if there was an unexpected error while searching
      void indexCreated(java.lang.String path)
      Called when an index has been created using the IndexClient.buildIndex() function
      void indexLoaded(java.lang.String path, int loaded)
      Called when a file has been loaded or has failed to be loaded by the Service
      void indexUnloaded(java.lang.String path, boolean unloaded)
      Called when a file was unloaded by the Service
      void searchCompleted(java.lang.String text, java.util.List<java.lang.String> results)
      Called when the SearchService has completed a filename search
      void searchCompleted(java.lang.String text, PageResult[] pageResults)
      Called when the SearchService has completed a content search

    • Method Detail

      • indexCreated

        void indexCreated(java.lang.String path)
        Called when an index has been created using the IndexClient.buildIndex() function
        Parameters:
        path - Path for the file added to the index

      • indexLoaded

        void indexLoaded(java.lang.String path,
               int loaded)
        Called when a file has been loaded or has failed to be loaded by the Service
        Parameters:
        path - Path for the file
        loaded - 0 if the file exists in the index and was not already loaded; 1 if the file was already loaded; 2 if the file was not loaded and does not exist in the index; -1 if there was an error

      • indexUnloaded

        void indexUnloaded(java.lang.String path,
                 boolean unloaded)
        Called when a file was unloaded by the Service
        Parameters:
        path - Path for the file
        unloaded - true if the file was previously loaded, false otherwise

      • searchCompleted

        void searchCompleted(java.lang.String text,
                   PageResult[] pageResults)
        Called when the SearchService has completed a content search
        Parameters:
        text - The term that was originally searched for
        pageResults - A list of search results

      • searchCompleted

        void searchCompleted(java.lang.String text,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> results)
        Called when the SearchService has completed a filename search
        Parameters:
        text - The term that was originally searched for
        results - A list of search results

      • errorWhileSearching

        void errorWhileSearching(java.lang.String text,
                       java.lang.String index)
        Called if there was an unexpected error while searching
        Parameters:
        text - The term that was originally searched for
        index - File that was being searched

      • connectedToService

        void connectedToService()
        Called when the IndexClient has connected to the ClientService; Files can now be loaded and searches can now be made

      • disconnectedFromService

        void disconnectedFromService()
        Called when the IndexClient has disconnected from the ClientService, the ClientService should now be disposed of
